price: A Verdade vem de teu Senhor. Então, não sejas de modo algum, dos contestadores.
arabic: ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُمۡتَرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: al-ḥaqu min rabbika falā takūnanna mina al-mum'tarīna
